channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Midweek Menu
channel.desc: James Martin serves up some of his favourite recipes from his Saturday Morning series that include a pumpkin soup that he made for guests Carol Vorderman and Joss Stone. S1 Ep11.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: This Morning
channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Loose Women
channel.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Darren Harriott, Laura Jackson, and Will Mellor all trying to 'say what they see' in aid of charity.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Competing for the cash are mother and daughter Ashleigh and Ruth from Essex, brother and sister-in-law Graeme and Gail from Aberdeen, and Dionne and husband Marcus from Birmingham.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Zandro from Buckinghamshire, Deborah from Prescot, Aimee from Wiltshire and Clive from Swansea - come together to take on a Chaser.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Charity is pregnant, April is manipulated by Ray, and Kammy covers for Vinny.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
channel.desc: Garlic and Grapes: Chef Tom Kerridge journeys across the heart of Spain to discover the secrets behind garlic and grapes before cooking up delicious dishes that celebrate them. S1 Ep4.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Fortune Hotel
channel.desc: A Twist in the Tale: Game show hosted by Stephen Mangan. A revealing Hotel Game stirs up suspicion before the guests shift into gear for a full-throttle Day Trip Challenge. S2 Ep4.

channel.title: ITV News at Ten
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.title: Creed III
channel.desc: Boxing drama film sequel starring Michael B Jordan and Tessa Thompson, 2023. Adonis Creed faces more than just a fight when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces.

channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by Rachel Parris to try pond dipping, Michael and Gen transform a charity advocate, and JJ Goodman serves up more delicious drinks. S1 Ep17.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Good Mood Food
channel.desc: Ainsley pays tribute to humble grains and pulses this time as he makes the most of their versatility and taste in dishes that include pan-seared sardines.

channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Andrea from Blackburn, Val from Solihull, Nabeel from Manchester and Meng originally from Melbourne - come together to take on a Chaser.

channel.title: Cooking with the Stars
channel.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen host as four new stars - Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Culculoglu, Shaun Wright-Phillips and Kelly Hoppen - cook for their loved ones with their mentors. S5 Ep2.

channel.desc: James is joined in the kitchen by Charley Boorman from Long Way Home while also enjoying a feast of delicious recipes from chefs Asma Khan, Ronnie Murray, and Mike Reid. S8 Ep20.

channel.title: EFL Wrexham v West Brom
channel.desc: Katie Shanahan presents EFL action from the Championship as Wrexham play host to West Bromwich Albion at the Racecourse Ground in their first second-tier match for 43 years.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: In for a Penny
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern takes the show across the pond for a special long episode from Walt Disney World Resort in Florida with classic games and brand-new ones too.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The qualified celebrity team members come face to face with 18-foot tiger sharks and find out if they can overcome their fear and learn to love these notorious predators. S1 Ep5.

channel.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

channel.title: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Comedian Jo Brand and TV presenter Dan Walker both have the chance to become the first-ever celebrity to win the jackpot, but will either succeed.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club
channel.desc: Find out how clever you are - and if you could be in the top one per cent of the UK - as Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show with a top prize of 100,000 pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: One Night
channel.desc: Simone: The first episode of an Australian drama series. A wannabe writer's debut manuscript is about to be published, but it is soon clear that the story isn't exclusively hers. S1 Ep1.

channel.desc: The guests featured with Jonathan in this show include Jack Black, Stormzy, Grace Jones, Steve Coogan, Emma Stone, Andy Serkis, Emma Thompson and Nile Rodgers. S2 Ep5.
